Are.na + Goby

Enter a channel URL to get started:

Hi, thanks for stopping by!

Goby is a tool for enriching Are.na channels with custom metadata.

It lets you add/organize new fields for your blocks with different types of information:

  • Short text strings
  • Longform text w/ markdown
  • URLs
  • Tags

I'll eventually explain in more detail here, but for now you can check out this channel to learn more about the project, and the github repo is located here.

â€” Nico

To edit goby channels, you'll need to give read/write access through Are.na.

Enter your are.na profile URL and click 'log in' to be taken to an authentication page.

None of your credentials will leave the app. See the source code here
